#set($explanationDoc = $xwiki.getDocument('Main.Satisfaction')) #set($explanationLink = "") #set ($columns = ['doc.title', 'ministeres', 'direction', 'niveauDematBoolean', 'votes', 'occurrences', 'moyenne', 'statut']) #set ($columnsProperties = { 'doc.title': {'filterable' : 'true'}, 'ministeres': {'type' : 'suggest', 'filterable' : 'true', 'sortable' : 'false'}, 'direction' : {'type' : 'hidden', 'filterable': 'true', 'sortable' : 'false'}, 'niveauDematBoolean': {'filterable' : 'false', 'sortable' : 'false'}, 'statut' : {'type' : 'hidden', 'filterable': 'false', 'sortable' : 'true'}, 'votes' : {'class' : 'Avis.Code.AvisStatsClass', 'filterable' : 'false', 'sortable' : 'true'}, 'occurrences' : {'class' : 'Avis.Code.AvisStatsClass', 'filterable' : 'false', 'sortable' : 'true'}, 'moyenne' : {'displayName' : "$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.dematdashboard.table.moyenne') $explanationLink", 'class' : 'Avis.Code.AvisStatsClass', 'filterable' : 'false', 'sortable' : 'true'} }) #set ($options = { 'className': 'Demarches.Code.DemarchesClass', 'translationPrefix': 'wikidemarches.dematdashboard.table.', 'tagCloud': true, 'rowCount': 10, 'maxPages': 7, 'selectedColumn': 'doc.title', 'defaultOrder': 'asc', 'extraParams' : 'statut%2Fjoin_mode=or&statut=active&statut=demandeUtilisateur&votes_class=Avis.Code.AvisStatsClass&occurrences_class=Avis.Code.AvisStatsClass&moyenne_class=Avis.Code.AvisStatsClass' }) #livetable('demarches' $columns $columnsProperties $options) #if($hasAdmin) {{addExcelExportToLivetable livetable="demarches" withPageName="true" withPageURL="true" filename="demarches"/}} #end
